name: Bulbasaur
trivia: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.

name: Charmander
trivia: The fire on the tip of its tail is a measure of its life. If healthy, its tail burns intensely.

name: Squirtle
trivia: It shelters itself in its shell then strikes back with spouts of water at every opportunity.

name: Pikachu
trivia: It occasionally uses an electric shock to recharge a fellow Pikachu that is in a weakened state.

name: Jolteon
trivia: By storing electricity in its body, it can shoot its bristlelike fur like a barrage of missiles.
